attributes.comment:
This comment is regarding DHS Docket No. USCIS-2006-0044 U.S. Citizenship
and Immigration Services.

I believe strongly that increasing adoption related expenses would be a great
disservice to families wanting to adopt. The costs to adopt are already incredibly
high and prove to be prohibitive for some families who not only have to come of
with the money to cover the adoption, but then have to find a way to cover the
costs of day-care and eventually college tuition. How do we save enough money
to cover it all? Increased fees will cause families to consider alternate options.
There are SO many children that need us. Please do not increase these fees.
Thank you.

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Kori A. Whitcomb
